Run function create 2024-09-01-welcome---blog folder, set working director folder, create index.qmd file basic YAML, open file. newpost() function one required argument: headline post. run newpost("Welcome blog!") Categories single comma-separated string character vector, “General, Community”. See intro vignette details.
